name: Q01.Prompt#1
pattern:
# Ignore the fixed scientific term "highly pathogenic avian influenza (HPAI)"
 \b(?:(?:highly(?!\s+pathogenic\s+avian(?:\s+flu|\s+influenza)?))
     |very|deadlier|more|extremely|severely|so|particularly|frighteningly|definitely|certainly)  
     (?:\s+\w+){0,3}\s+
 # Risk-adj list (adding infectious, transmissible) while pruning ECON adjective "volatile"
 (deadly|lethal|dangerous|severe|catastrophic|brutal|contagious|virulent|destructive|infectious|transmissible)\b|
 # Fixed lethal-from-outset idiom
 \bdeadly\s+from\s+(?:the\s+)?(?:start|outset)\b|
 # Superlative + risk-adj
 \bmost\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}?(?:deadly|destructive|dangerous|severe|catastrophic|devastating|virulent|contagious|lethal)\b
 # Incredibly / unbelievably / increasingly + risk-adj
 \b(?:incredibly|unbelievably|increasingly)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}?(?:deadly|dangerous|severe|lethal|catastrophic|virulent|contagious)\b

name: Q02.Prompt#1
pattern:
\b(?:  # high-potency verbs that always count
      ravaged|devastated|skyrocketed|plummeted|crashed|nosedived|
      tanked|slaughtered|exploding|raging|tearing\sthrough|
      overwhelmed|crippling|
      # soared/soaring ONLY when followed within 20 chars by an impact noun
      soar(?:ed|ing)?(?=[^.]{0,20}\b
            (?:cases?|prices?|costs?|loss(?:es)?|deaths?|fatalities|
             production|output|supply|shortages?)\b)|
      # Superlative-negative-noun patterns
      (?:most|record(?:-breaking)?|worst)\s+\w{0,12}?\s+
            (?:disaster|crisis|outbreak|catastrophe|calamity)|
             # Critical-alert phrase – fires only when threat keyword is nearby
       (?:                                     # critical-alert phrase (bidirectional)
         # "on high alert" – bidirectional, exclude future "will be on high alert"
         (?:
           # threat → alert
           (?:outbreak|virus|flu|disease|h5n1|threat|danger|risk)\b[^.]{0,40}
           (?!(?:\s*\w+){0,3}\swill\s+be\s+on\s+high\s+alert)
           (?:is|are|was|were)?\s*on\s+high\s+alert
         |
           # alert → threat
           (?!(?:\s*\w+){0,3}\swill\s+be\s+on\s+high\s+alert)
           (?:is|are|was|were)?\s*on\s+high\s+alert[^.]{0,40}
           (?:outbreak|virus|flu|disease|h5n1|threat|danger|risk)\b
         )
       )
+) \b
 | # Spark/stoke fears pattern
\b(?:spark(?:ing)?|stoke(?:s|d|ing)?|fuel(?:s|ed|ing)?|raise(?:s|d|ing)?)\s+(?:public\s+)?(?:fear|fears|concern|concerns|panic)\b[^.]{0,50}\b(?:outbreak|virus|flu|disease|threat|risk|danger|loss(?:es)?)\b
| # Worst-ever crisis cliché
\bworst[-\s]?ever\s+(?:outbreak|crisis|disaster|catastrophe)\b
| # Battered / pummelled + agriculture/econ noun
\b(?:battered|pummell?ed)\b(?=[^.]{0,25}\b(?:flock|farm|sector|supply|economy|community)\b)
| # "Perfect storm" + threat keyword
\bperfect\s+storm\b[^.]{0,40}\b(?:outbreak|virus|flu|disease|threat|crisis|danger)\b

name: Q04.Prompt#1
pattern:
\b(?:should|can|could|will)\s+\w+\s+(?:be\s+)?(?:worried|concerned|afraid)\b
(?=[^.?]{0,40}\b(?:outbreak|virus|flu|disease|h5n1|threat|danger|risk)\b)

# Do we really / Can we afford … ?
^\s*(?:do|can|should|will)\s+we\s+(?:really|afford)\b.*\?$

name: Q05.Prompt#1
pattern:
\b(?:no\s+cause\s+for\s+alarm|
     public\s+can\s+rest\s+easy|
     fully\s+under\s+control|
     completely\s+safe|
     (?:we\s+are\s+confident\b|we're\s+confident\b|
     rest\s+assured|
     situation\s+contained|
     providing\s+relief|feel(?:ing)?\s+positive|feel(?:ing)?\s+optimistic)|
     (risk|likelihood|chance)\s+(?:of\s+\w+\s+)?(?:is|are|remains|stay|stays)\s+(?:very|extremely|exceptionally|remarkably)\s+low|
     # Explicit consumption safety
     (?:is|are|remains|remain|stay|stays)\s+(?:completely\s+|totally\s+|perfectly\s+|entirely\s+)?safe\s+(?:to\s+eat|for\s+(?:human\s+)?consumption|for\s+(?:all\s+)?(?:consumers?|people|humans|residents|citizens))|
     # Prepared/ready cue qualifies only if public/consumer term within 40 chars
     (?:fully|well)\s+(?:prepared|ready)\s+(?:to\s+(?:handle|deal\s+with)|for)
      .{0,40}\b(?:public|consumers?|customers?|people|residents|citizens)\b|
     # "Fortunately for consumers …" cue
     \b[Ff]ortunately\b[^.]{0,40}\b(?:consumers?|public|residents|citizens|people)\b)

name: Q06.Prompt#1
pattern:
\b(?:only|just|merely|a\s+single|few)\b
        [^.]{0,40}            # allow ≤40 chars
        \b(?:out\s+of|among)\b
        [^.]*                 # must see a **number / quantifier** afterward
        \b(?:hundred|thousand|million|billion|\d{1,3}(?:[, ]\d{3})*|\d+)\b
| # Minimiser + percentage
\b(?:only|just|merely)\s+\d{1,2}(?:[.,]\d+)?\s*%\b
| # "Only one ... of/in thousands"
\b(?:only|just|merely)\s+one\b[^.]{0,40}\b(?:of|in|among)\b[^.]{0,20}\bthousands?\b

name: Q08.Prompt#1
pattern:
# Prepared / ready **without** a public-safety link  (fires Q8 → Neutral)
\b(?:fully|well)\s+(?:prepared|ready)\s+(?:to\s+(?:handle|deal\s+with)|for)\b
(?![^.]{0,40}\b(?:public|consumers?|customers?|people|residents|citizens)\b)
